ygData.subject: Re: What do you think about a few new spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I think these are great spell ideas  Probably too useful for Verant to implement. :)   All the other classes have whined and gotten buffed up a bit; maybe we
ygData.messageBody:
I think these are great spell ideas Probably too useful for Verant to
implement. :) All the other classes have whined and gotten buffed up a bit;
maybe we should to...heheheh.

// mark




In a message dated 5/26/99, 1:58:11 PM, eq_wizards@onelist.com writes:
<<From: sdunn@...
Reply-to: eq_wizards@onelist.com
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
From: sdunn@...

I've been thinking about a few new spells that Verant should implement, tell
me what you all think. Most of these new spells is to reinforce the ability
for wizards to travel, so far it appears that Druids are just as good, or
even better then wizards with Spirt of the Wolf for traveling.

Summon - Teleports group member inside the zone to your location

Phase - Teleports yourself to location of other group member inside zone

Greater Summon - Teleports group member to your location, even across zones

Greater Phase - Teleports yourself to a group members location, even across
zones

Group Gate - Slow casting spell which teleports group to your bind spot,
doesn't leave anyone behind

Retreat - Evacuate version of group gate

Haste - Increases movement rate for self only.>>
